entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 11:19 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: N 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or periods of rain changing to periods of rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain overnight. Fog patches in onshore winds overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
